voiceDisconnect.name: Voice Disconnect
voiceDisconnect.note: Disconnect from voice server when closing Discord

twentyFourHour.name: 24-Hour Timestamps
twentyFourHour.note: Hides channels when in minimal mode

classNormalizer.name: Normalize Classes
classNormalizer.note: Adds stable classes to elements to help themes. (e.g. adds .da-channels to .channels-Ie2l6A)

showToasts.name: Show Toasts
showToasts.note: Shows a small notification for important information

voiceMode.name: Voice Mode
voiceMode.note: Hides everything that isn't voice chat

minimalMode.name: Minimal Mode
minimalMode.note: Hide elements and reduce the size of elements

hideChannels.name: Hide Channels
hideChannels.note: Hides channels when in minimal mode

darkMode.name: Dark Mode
darkMode.note: Make certain elements dark by default

coloredText.name: Colored Text
coloredText.note: Make text colour the same as role color

addonErrors.name: Show Addon Errors
addonErrors.note: Shows a modal with plugin/theme errors

autoScroll.name: Scroll To Settings
autoScroll.note: Auto-scrolls to a plugin's settings when the button is clicked (only if out of view)

autoReload.name: Automatic Loading
autoReload.note: Automatically loads, reloads, and unloads plugins and themes

liveUpdate.name: Live Update
liveUpdate.note: Updates the css as you type

startDetached.name: Start Detached
startDetached.note: Clicking the Custom CSS tab opens the editor in a separate window

nativeOpen.name: Open in Native Editor
nativeOpen.note: Clicking the Custom CSS tab opens your custom css in your native editor

developerMode.name: Developer Mode
developerMode.note: Allows activating debugger when pressing F8

copySelector.name: Copy Selector
copySelector.note: Adds a "Copy Selector" option to context menus when developer mode is active

transparency.name: Enable Transparency
transparency.note: Enables the main window to be see-through (requires restart)

frame.name: Window Frame
frame.note: Adds the native os window frame to the main window

download.name: Download Emotes
download.note: Download emotes once a week to stay up to date

emoteMenu.name: Emote Menu
emoteMenu.note: Show Twitch/Favourite emotes in emote menu

hideEmojiMenu.name: Hide Emoji Menu
hideEmojiMenu.note: Hides Discord's emoji menu when using emote menu

modifiers.name: Show Emote Modifiers
modifiers.note: Enable emote mods (flip, spin, pulse, spin2, spin3, 1spin, 2spin, 3spin, tr, bl, br, shake, shake2, shake3, flap)

animateOnHover.name: Animate On Hover
animateOnHover.note: Only animate the emote modifiers on hover

Emotes.downloading: Downloading emotes in the background do not reload.

CustomCSS.confirmationText: You have unsaved changes to your Custom CSS. Closing this window will lose all those changes.
